name: comparing-frameworks
description: The intention of this project is to compare different front end frameworks, consuming from the same backend/api to evaluate ease of use and functionality/feature sets

scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm install --prefix angular && npm install --prefix vue && npm install --prefix react
scripts.heroku-postbuild: ng build --prefix angular && node build/build.js --prefix vue && npm build --prefix react

author: Neil Langford
